name: ChrisMaze
description:
Welcome to ChrisMaze!!!

This is a 3D First Person Maze Puzzle Game where you have to find Santa's Hat before Christmas comes along so Santa can go deliver his presents.

This game was a submission for Jame Gam Christmas Edition.

Please Enjoy!!!

Oh, Also - Wish you all a very Merry Christmas!! Hope you enjoy them to the fullest.

Controls: 

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backwards

D - Right

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

Credits To:

1)  Low Poly Christmas- Mini Set [+60 Models and Prefabs] by VNB - Leo.

https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-xmas-mini-set-60-models-vnb-leo
